channel.title: Help with this project please
channel.description: Hello, im trying to get this client working the source is running perfectly fine, but I don't know whats going on with the client... the name of source/client is project exile if someone could maybe fix it then send me the link or help me figure this problem out id appreciate it a lot! thank you.

item.title: Help with this project please
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“tank nation, post:3, topic:546196”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=665090.msg4446097#msg4446097 date=1408888096]
Your run is looking in the wrong place for the main class
[/quote]

Okay how do I find my main class so I can make it understand where to go?[/quote]
Your main class will be client.
You need to make sure the run.bat is targeting the client.class (in the parameters it will be just ‘client’ unless packaged).

Read full topic
